attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to support my hero, idol, and overall king president cheeto. however when i downloaded the app, an eagle swooped down and snatched my phone!! he said my allegiance to the trump campaign was fake! the eagle said trump did not want my support because he did not believe it was genuine! i am shocked that my lord and savior would say such a thing about his most loyal supporter. after getting my phone back i immediately deleted this app because of the betrayal i felt from someone who i looked up to so much! do not download or else you will experience the betrayal i felt!
attributes.title: do not download!!

attributes.review: I installed the app to be able to support the big orange 🍊 , but as soon as I installed it the app was giving me viruses and other types of problems that I had to get a new phone because my old one was soo damaged😔. If you could please do your privacy and safety, and the safety of your phones (cough cough, and gen Z🤫) a favor by not installing this horrible app🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: NEGATIVE ONE MILLION STARS🤢🤮

attributes.review: well first off, this app took 16 hours to download on a perfectly new phone, with great wifi. and once i downloaded it, it keeps glitching and got rid of all my contact names in my phone! and then when i went to delete the app, a scary orange man popped up on my screen saying i had gotten a virus! and now my icloud is broken and i can’t do anything. and worst of all this app on my phone wont delete! and i’m getting very impatient. unless this app gets fixed soon, i will continue to repost reviews on different accounts. so disappointing!!
attributes.title: this app is absolutely horrible!

attributes.review: Upon downloading this app, my phone was attacked by bugs. Now all that my phone does is chant “bunker boy”. I immediately had to delete this application due to the extreme migraine that this repeated noise caused me. I can’t believe that our president would support such a messed up app and inflict this pain upon me through my device.
attributes.title: Worst app I have ever downloaded

attributes.review: I downloaded the app only to try and support my lord and savior orange man but as soon as I opened it I heard a scream downstairs. Turns out trump sent his secret team of assassins to kill my whole family👁👄👁. Now I’m an orphan and my whole life will forever be ruined because I just tried to support my king above kings☹️💔. Kindly please delete the app so more innocent families are not killed🥺🙏🏻.

This app took FOREVER to download. When it finally did it just wouldn't open and keep glitching. I'm so disappointed that I wasn't able to see all the ✨Racist, Homophobic, Transphobic, Xenophobic, etc✨ news and content on this app😞. Definitely would not recommend downloading it, too many problems. 🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: This app just ain't it🤡

attributes.review: After taking ages to download, I opened the app and it immediately crashed my whole fun, and then it caused my phone to play the national anthem. Finally I got my phone back up and running and then I opened the app and it crashed again, this time taking me weeks to get it to work. I do not recommend this app 0/10.
attributes.title: A yucky app tbh

attributes.review: After downloading the app I received a series of bad luck events the first one being when I opened the app, a giant nest of murder hornets entered my house and stung me. Moments later my mom died from falling down the stairs and my pet dog ran away. After that a tornado occurred and blew my arm off. I’m now in therapy suffering all the tragic events that happened all because of Donald Trump.
attributes.title: Gave me trauma

attributes.review: This app with the worst. It glitches and takes forever to download. Whenever I go on I see a disgusting person in the front screen and I don’t like seeing that. This app is the worst one I’ve ever seen. This app deserves one store due to the lack of effort to make it better. Honestly whoever has app is just a terrible person.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: Worst app ever took days downloading I think that he should worry about his app instead of  trying to banned other apps plus I don’t get the point who wants to know about the terrible president he is. He also says make America Great does it look you are trying to make it great like honey does it look great thanks I am going to unload the app🤮🤢
attributes.title: Review
